name: Easy Pistachio English Toffee Ice Box Cake
author: sweetjunkie
summary: This delicious, easy no-bake ice box cake is perfect to have your kids help you prepare! It's light too, so you won't feel too guilty about letting them have an extra serving.
ingredients: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping, thawed
3 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered English toffee, chopped
directions: Tear angel food cake into bite-size pieces (1 to 2 square inches) and place in the bottom of a 9x13 inch pan
Prepare pudding with milk as directed on package
Gently stir whipped topping into pudding; pour mixture over angel food cake pieces
Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight before serving
